name: add_user_to_usergroup
description: Add a user to a user group

input_parameters.name: usergroup_id
input_parameters.description: The ID for the user group to add the user to

input_parameters.name: user_ids
input_parameters.description: A list of user IDs to add to the User Group

output_parameters.name: usergroup_id
output_parameters.description: The ID for the user group that now contains the added user(s)
